summary: Silent Sound Effects (Level Up, Skill Up, Quest Updates, Discover Location) with Optional Files for Silent Sneak Attack and Silent Soul Capture.
descriptionHtml:
~~Silent Sounds~~

As in Oblivion it was both jarring and absolutely annoying to be given an audio cue each time I leveled a skill or my character. This is simply some silent audio files that replace leveling a skill and your character as we,l as discovering a location and quest updates. I also have added optional files for silent sneak attack and silent soul capture. I may in fact add an optional file for the healing spell since it is extremely loud. No more redundant and loud sound FX. Thanks.

I have a working ImmersiveUI with optional files here that goes well with this:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1639

Version 1.0
Silent sounds for leveling up and Skill Ups

Version 1.2
Added Silent Sound for quest Updates
Added Silent Sound for Sneak Attacks

Version 1.2 (Optional)
Added Silent Sound for Soul Capture as per request (This will affect all Soul Trap both cast directly or enchantments 

on weapons)

Version 1.3
Added Silent Sound for Discovering a Location
Moved Sneak Attack to Optional

Version 1.4
Added in the last of the Discovered Location Sounds and made them silent

Install:
Just unpack the files into your data folder in the skyrim game directory.

~runicNomad~
author: runicNomad
